title: Vaishnavi Diamond Bangle - A Touch of Tradition
materials: Emerald and Ruby accents. The gold exhibits a rich
lustrous finish achieved through meticulous hand-polishing techniques unique to Hyderabad.
features: This exquisite bangle showcases a captivating geometric design, featuring a central, diamond-encrusted square. The design incorporates delicate filigree work, reminiscent of traditional South Indian jewelry artistry. An emerald and ruby accents provide a subtle color contrast, echoing traditional Telugu aesthetics. The pave setting of the CZ diamonds enhances brilliance and ensures a secure hold. Its openable design ensures easy wearability.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white from the CZ Diamonds. Emerald (green) and Ruby (red) provide eye-catching accents.
occasions: and special occasions. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for modern evening wear.
description: This Vaishnavi Diamond Bangle beautifully blends traditional South Indian design with modern craftsmanship. The brilliant CZ diamonds provide a luxurious sparkle at an accessible price point. The 22K gold ensures lasting value and durability, making it a cherished heirloom. Its Hyderabadi polish guarantees a radiant finish, reflecting the region's renowned craftsmanship.
